channel.title: Comments for page "Sho Nuff Elixir"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Sho Nuff Elixir"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: buy at marketplace with low price (about 10 mill ryo usually) at 11th day of 11th month and few days later when there are a lot of them at BvS from O11k if ur luck/money low and u are not in hurry:) or ask buddies for trades with discount when they get it(they should share this info):)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
That's hardly helpful, considering Shikyo noted not really wanting to build up the ryo to buy one, and throwing 110M on one is even more foolish.

Are you using the scratchy script v4? I heard you can get a SNE in a month or 2 with it, depending on luck. You could also try the FIGHTO route, if you have a TBW. The tsukiball game isn't worth it really, as you can check the math for it, but chances are better to spend less than 110M through that.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Drop all your change on one in the marketplace. Or, 110M on Marksman while you have a TBW out.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Anyone have any tips on getting this? Ive spent millions on the deceptive tsukiball and the scratch tickets but havent gotten it yet in 18 seasons. Words o wisdom? because it would prolly take me a few years to build up enough ryo to buy one from the market place.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: kinda makes me wonder what happens to those who have the glow, and attempt to consume this anyways
